video_prompt: A celestial light swirls and shimmers across a mystical landscape within an unfurling scroll. A graceful figure in flowing robes subtly floats and turns amidst fantastical structures. Luminous flowers on shifting water glow and pulse, reflecting the changing sky. The scroll slowly unrolls, revealing more of the vibrant, dreamlike world within.
image_prompt: Fantasy art, Chinese scroll: A mystical, vibrant landscape with ethereal glowing mountains and pagodas, reflecting in a serene body of water. A graceful 3D goddess figure in flowing robes floats amidst swirling celestial light, surrounded by luminous lotus flowers. Ornate golden borders and finials frame the scene, creating a dreamlike, magical atmosphere.
refined_video_prompt: Celestial light swirls and shimmers across an unfolding landscape. A graceful figure in flowing robes subtly floats and turns. Luminous flowers on shifting water glow and pulse, reflecting a changing sky. The scroll steadily unrolls, continuously revealing new, vibrant sections of the world within.
